file.name: issue264.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: "Dashed-case enum names with numeric components don't get converted properly"
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /foo:
    get:
      operationId: getFoo
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: FooEnum
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/FooEnum"
          required: true
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
components:
  schemas:
    FooEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - foo-bar-1
        - baz-quux-2-flurb
#        - 3-moo-cow

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /foo: get: operation "getFoo": parameters: parse parameter "FooEnum": resolve "#/components/schemas/FooEnum" reference: invalid parameter reference: "#/components/schemas/FooEnum"
